{autor} {sep} {icon_github} {icon_twitter} {icon_instagram} ", "{icon_mastodon} {icon_bsky} {usuario}" ) ``` ::: ## Datos ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(2025, 18) nsf_terminations <- tuesdata$nsf_terminations ``` ::: ## Procesamiento Me interesa... ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} d <- nsf_terminations |> count(org_state, sort = TRUE) |> rename(state = org_state) ``` ::: ## Figura Figura. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} c1 <- "#420F75" c2 <- "#552000" mi_subitulo <- glue( "La administración Trump decidió terminar con {{{c1} _**{nrow(nsf_terminations)}**_}} subvenciones a investigación. **California** fue el estado más afectado con {{{c2} _**{d[d$state == 'CA', ]$n}**_}} proyectos finalizados." ) g <- usmap::plot_usmap( data = d, values = "n", regions = "states", exclude = c("AK", "HI"), linewidth = .3, color = scales::col_lighter("#E1C1C8") ) + scale_fill_steps2( low = "#7640A9", mid = "grey95", high = "#8A4D00", midpoint = 62, breaks = c(1, seq(25, 125, 25)), limits = c(1, 125), na.value = "grey30", name = "Cantidad de\nproyectos\nafectados" ) + labs( subtitle = mi_subitulo ) + theme_minimal(base_family = "ubuntu", base_size = 15) + theme( plot.background = element_rect(fill = "#E1C1C8"), plot.subtitle = marquee::element_marquee(width = 1, lineheight = 1), panel.grid = element_blank(), axis.text = element_blank(), legend.text = element_text(family = "jet", size = rel(.6)), legend.title = element_text(margin = margin(b = 20)), legend.key.height = unit(.6, "cm"), legend.key.width = unit(.7, "cm") ) ggsave( plot = g, filename = "tidytuesday/2025/semana_18.png", width = 30, height = 19, units = "cm" ) browseURL(paste0(getwd(), "/tidytuesday/2025/semana_18.png")) ``` ::: Guardo. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggsave( plot = g, filename = "tidytuesday/2025/semana_18.png", width = 30, height = 30, units = "cm" ) ``` :::
